EmailTemplate.name: 202006_BK_Webinar_SocialFlight_AeroNav_IFR_Training_MC.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Today! From iPad to Panel: Multiply your screens using ForeFlight and AeroNav/Avidyne navigators
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From iPad to Panel: Multiply your screens using ForeFlight and AeroNav/Avidyne navigators
Date: Today, Thursday, June 25th, 2020 8:00pm EST
Reminder to join us this evening as we show you how transitioning from flight planning to navigation has never been easier. You’ll learn tips and tricks to seamless integration using Foreflight and your AeroNav navigators and double or triple your screens and increase your situational awareness.
Can't join? We will send the recording once it's available so no one misses out.
THERE’S STILL TIME TO REGISTER: CLICK HERE <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/3092350472441892865]]>
Produced in association with SocialFlight.com <[[http://www.socialflight.com/search.php]]>, your webinar registration includes FREE access to information on over 10,000 aviation events, destinations, airport restaurants, contests and more listed on SocialFlight.com, the SocialFlight mobile apps and Local Aviation Event Planner.
